verbs.description: Since last Tuesday , construction [V: has] been underway on eight prototypes for President Donald Trump 's promised wall along the US - Mexico border .
[ARGM-TMP: Since last Tuesday] , [ARG1: construction] has [V: been] [ARG2: underway on eight prototypes for President Donald Trump 's promised wall along the US - Mexico border] .
Since last Tuesday , construction has been underway on eight prototypes for [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's] [V: promised] [ARG1: wall] along the US - Mexico border .
